import React from 'react' import { MdShoppingBasket } from 'react-icons/md' import { RiShirtLine } from 'react-icons/ri' import { Container, Cart, Home } from './styles' import { useCart } from '../../hooks/useCart' const Header = () => { const { cart } = useCart(); const cartSize = cart.length return ( ARLOCLOTHING
Meu carrinho {cartSize === 1 ? `${cartSize} item` : `${cartSize} itens`}
) } export default Header
